trends: There have been no other sightings in Marshall
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsfriend setting on back porch noticed and called me to witness sighting. I drew attention from my neighbor and she witnessed the sighting. It was moving in a straight line and same elevation and at a constant speed, that of a normal jet liner. No sound noted by my friend or myself.
Summary: Silver cigar shaped, no wings, no sound, flying about same height as passenger jet to the west north-west with evening sun reflecitng bright silver color.
